definitions.text: acting with or marked by or resulting from great force or energy or emotional intensity
effected by force or injury rather than natural causes
(of colors or sounds) intensely vivid or loud
examples: her dress was a violent red

definitions.text: marked by extreme intensity of emotions or convictions; inclined to react violently; fervid
characterized by violence or bloodshed; - Andrea Parke; - Thomas Gray; - Hudson Strode
examples: writes of crimson deeds and barbaric days
